name: The Florest Bizarre Adventure
description:
Just some reupload of a game I made years ago for game engines subject.

All the credits are in the game.

Controls:

  • "Space bar" to shoot
  • "Q" or "Down Arrow" key to slide
  • "W" or "Up Arrow" key to jump
  • "S" key to open the store
  • "Esc" key to pause the game
